description: New boys on show as Hearts beaten by Leeds
title: New boys on show as Hearts beaten by Leeds
title_page: New boys on show as Hearts beaten by Leeds - BBC Sport
maintext:
Calem Nieuwenhof and Frankie Kent made their debut as Hearts wrapped up pre-season with a 1-0 home defeat by Leeds United.
Luke Ayling tucked home Luis Sinisterra's cutback shortly before half-time for a deserved opener.
Dan James had a second for Leeds ruled out for offside and Yutaro Oda and Jorge Grant went close for Hearts before Kent headed wide late on.
